personal.name: Andrei Volzhin
personal.summary: I am a versatile and experienced software developer with a strong background in multiple programming languages and technologies. My expertise lies in Go/Golang, PHP, JavaScript, and ReactJS, and I have a proven track record of creating successful web applications and services. I have honed my skills through various projects, including website development, CRM system design, real-time communication integration, and chatbot development. With a focus on innovation and problem-solving, I am well-equipped to tackle complex challenges in the world of software development.

skills.description: Extensive experience in building interactive and user-friendly web interfaces using ReactJS.
Expertise in developing high-performance backend systems, including the migration of a complex CRM project from PHP to GoLang.
Skilled in integrating SIP (Session Initiation Protocol) into web applications using JSSIP, with in-depth knowledge of Asterisk (FreePBX) server for VoIP solutions.
Familiar with creating Telegram and Discord bots, demonstrating the ability to automate processes and interact with external APIs.

descriptions: Successfully developed and launched numerous websites, showcasing a keen eye for design and functionality.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of frontend and backend components.
Led the migration of an internal CRM system from PHP to GoLang, resulting in improved performance, scalability, and maintainability.
Acted as a frontend helper, contributing to the development of a ReactJS library for efficient UI component reuse.
Designed and implemented real-time communication features by integrating SIP into web applications using JSSIP, enhancing user engagement and interactivity.
Utilized Asterisk (FreePBX) server expertise to establish reliable VoIP solutions, contributing to the success of the project.
Created and maintained Telegram and Discord bots, automating tasks, and enhancing user experiences.
Implemented custom features and integrations with external services to meet project-specific requirements.

achievements: Active contributor to open-source projects related to GoLang and ReactJS, demonstrating a commitment to the developer community.
Regularly participate in tech meetups, conferences, and online forums to stay updated with the latest trends and innovations in software development.
Committed to continuous learning and professional growth, with a passion for exploring emerging technologies.
personal.conclusion: As a software developer with a diverse skill set and a track record of successfully delivering projects, I am well-equipped to take on challenging roles in web development, real-time communication, and bot development. My commitment to innovation, adaptability, and ongoing self-improvement makes me a valuable asset in any software development team or project.
education: South Ural State University. National Research University. Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Informatics.
